cause.description:
As members of this cause, we look to spread the awareness of vampyres to the mundane and often closed minds of others in the world, ultimately showing that we can be helpful within the community. The shear fact is that others react to Vampyres the way they do based on the fact that they know nothing of who we are. We all feel here that we can prove ourselves to others around who are not so understanding. We wish you luck in all your campaigns and please remember to make them a peaceful ones. Blessed be.
Vampyre http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=2326901658
OVC Real Vampires http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=2825896443
The Wiccan Facebook Support Network http://apps.facebook.com/causes/view_cause/1295?recruiter_id=2442204
Smoke and Mirrors Vampiric Support http://smokeandmirrors34981.yuku.com/
1. Bring awareness of vampyres to all
2. Show we are not a danger to society
3. Put an End to Discrimanation Of our Kind
cause.mission: To show the mundane world that vampyres are not harmful
cause.name: Vampyre Awareness
